external_references.description: Red Canary Intelligence. (2024, December 2). Storm-1811 exploits RMM tools to drop Black Basta ransomware. Retrieved March 14, 2025.
Tyler McGraw, Thomas Elkins, and Evan McCann. (2024, May 10). Ongoing Social Engineering Campaign Linked to Black Basta Ransomware Operators. Retrieved January 31, 2025.

objects.description: [Storm-1811](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1046) has deployed large volumes of non-malicious email spam to victims in order to prompt follow-on interactions with the threat actor posing as IT support or helpdesk to resolve the problem.(Citation: rapid7-email-bombing)(Citation: RedCanary Storm-1811 2024)
